text: Ticket #12847: Customer reports that the mobile app crashes when trying to upload photos. Issue started yesterday after the latest app update (version 2.3.1). User has iPhone 12 running iOS 16.4. Error occurs consistently when selecting photos from gallery. App works fine for text posts and comments. Customer has already tried restarting phone and reinstalling app with no success. Priority: High - affecting multiple users based on app store reviews.

analyzer.analysis: The content appears to be a technical issue report, detailing a problem with the mobile app's ability to upload photos. The customer has reported that the issue started after the latest app update (version 2.3.1) and occurs consistently when selecting photos from the gallery. The analysis suggests that the issue may be related to the updated version of the app or the iPhone/iOS combination.

classifier.reasoning: The content reports a technical issue with the mobile app's ability to upload photos, which is a specific and well-defined problem. The fact that it occurred after an app update and affects multiple users suggests high priority.
